titleStmt.title: A lapidary, or, The history of pretious [sic] stones with cautions for the undeceiving of all those that deal with pretious [sic] stones / by Thomas Nicols ...
titleStmt.author: Nicols, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Published also in 1653 under title: Arcula gemmea, or, A cabinet of jewels; and in 1659 under title: Gemmarius fidelius, or, The faithful lapidary ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
